summary: [TabS7 FE T OS] Platform Solutions IOT
description:
Refer timelines here:

https://mobilerndhub.sec.samsung.net/wiki/display/~avinash.g/IOT+Status 

 

This task captures all steps to be taken for completion of Platform solutions IOT for New devices and OS upgrades.

The Task will be created when a device is planned and started 5 Weeks prior to software submision.

6 Weeks remaining: Platform solutions team start the Pre-Test. 

4 Weeks remaining: Ship Devices/ Software to carrier teams.

2.5 Weeks remaining: Ensure that reports are available. 

2 Weeks (New devices) or 1 Week (SU) remaining: Share with TPM.
